headline: 1 Glorious Growth Stock Down 33% to Buy Hand Over Fist, According to Wall Street
summary: Datadog (NASDAQ: DDOG) stock is still trading 33% below its record level from 2021.  It was unquestionably overvalued back then, but it's starting to look attractive thanks to the company's rapid revenue growth, soaring profits, and expanding portfolio of artificial intelligence (AI) products.  In fact, The Wall Street Journal tracks 46 analysts who cover Datadog stock, and the majority have assigned it the highest-possible buy rating, with not a single analyst recommending to sell.
